verbs.description: [ARG1: another ex - sri lanka cricketer] [V: charged] [ARG2: with corruption] sri lankan cricket was embroiled in more accusations of corruption when the national team bowling coach was charged by the sport world governing body with involvement in fixing matches the international cricket council says nuwan zoysa has been provisionally suspended after being charged with three counts of breaching its anti - corruption - code two weeks ago sri lanka great sanath jayasuriya was charged with two counts of disrupting an investigation into corrupt activity dubai united arab emirates 1997 2207 1997 - 2207 international cricket council sri lanka nuwan zoysa sanath jayasuriya lanka
